title: jAnakIramaNage
sahitya:
jAnakIramaNige jaya mangaLa jaya jAnhavi janakage shubha mangaLa


caraNam 1    vAtasuta hanuman paDayage mangaLa kyAta raghupatige jaya mangaLa
    caraNam 2    sEtuva kaTTida rAyage mangaLa sItA rAmarige jaya mangaLa
    caraNam 3    billu muricuvage binkada daityara hallu muridavage jaya mangaLa
    caraNam 4    kallu nAriya paDadavage mangaLa balla shrI rAmarige shubha mangaLa
    caraNam 5    pisaja janakayyana caraNakke mangaLa asama timmappanige jaya mangaLa
    caraNam 6    vAsava vandita purandara viTTalage puruSOttamage shubha mangaLa
